synopsis.text: Aika Sumeragi, a high school prodigy with a knack for athletics, has achieved the impressive feat of securing a C-class salvager's license. Despite her competence, her youthful exuberance and fiery temperament often lead others to underestimate her abilities, leaving her jobless in the salvaging field. Undeterred, Aika advertises her services within her school, catching the eye of Eri, the affluent head of the treasure hunting club. Eri presents Aika with an intriguing salvaging task, leading her on a thrilling adventure aboard a cutting-edge submarine on Eri's private cruiser. However, as Aika uncovers the perilous nature of her assignment, she finds herself entangled in a conflict with a mysterious group of armed high school girls on the southern islands. Amidst this turmoil, Aika encounters an enigmatic girl named Karen, setting the stage for a challenging journey filled with hidden treasures and unexpected revelations.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
